function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases through human mobility","Impact":"High risk of rapid disease transmission and diffusion across multiple patches","Mitigation":"Implement travel restrictions, social distancing, and mandatory masks to reduce human mobility","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and air filtration systems","People":"Local residents, travelers, commuters, and visitors","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Limited carrying capacity for mosquito larvae in each patch","Impact":"Risk of mosquito population exceeding carrying capacity and causing disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement larvicide treatments, mosquito population monitoring, and habitat modification to reduce larval numbers","Technologies":"Mosquito traps, larvicide sprays, and biological control agents","People":"Local residents, environmental agencies, and public health organizations","Owner":"Community leaders, environmental agencies, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Mosquito-borne virus transmission through human-mosquito interaction","Impact":"High risk of virus transmission from infected mosquitoes to susceptible humans within the same patch","Mitigation":"Implement mosquito control programs, use of insect repellents, and regular monitoring of mosquito-borne diseases","Technologies":"Mosquito nets, insecticide-treated clothing, and mosquito surveillance devices","People":"Local residents, outdoor workers, and public health workers","Owner":"Community leaders, public health agencies, and environmental organizations"}]}
